QuestData.Title: Gan'dranda
QuestData.Description: As fun as it is to butt heads with these trolls, we've got other things to do down here. It'd be nice to get this battle over with, aye?$B$BTheir commander, Gan'dranda, sits in the ruined walls to the southeast of the battlefield. Our boys have most of their forces locked up, so I want you to slip in there and take out Gan'dranda. When they see a $r standin' over the corpse of their biggest hero it should take some of the fight out of 'em!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Our dwarves stand a much better chance once this brute is dead on the ground.
QuestData.RewardText: Now that's what I like to hear! Good on ya.
